00015 namespace ndarray {
00016 
00017 class Manager : private boost::noncopyable {
00018 public:
00019 
00020     typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<Manager> Ptr;
00021 
00022     friend inline void intrusive_ptr_add_ref(Manager const * manager) {
00023         ++manager->_rc;
00024     }
00025  
00026     friend inline void intrusive_ptr_release(Manager const * manager) {
00027         if ((--manager->_rc)==0) delete manager;
00028     }
00029 
00030     int getRC() const { return _rc; }
00031 
00032     virtual bool isUnique() const { return false; }
00033 
00034 protected:
00035 
00036     explicit Manager() : _rc(1) {}
00037 
00038     virtual ~Manager() {}
00039 
00040 private:
00041     mutable int _rc;
00042 };
00043 
00044 template <typename T>
00045 class SimpleManager : public Manager {
00046     typedef typename boost::remove_const<T>::type U;
00047 public:
00048     
00049     static std::pair<Manager::Ptr,T*> allocate(int size) {
00050         boost::intrusive_ptr<SimpleManager> r(new SimpleManager(size), false);
00051         return std::pair<Manager::Ptr,T*>(r, r->_p.get());
00052     }
00053 
00054     virtual bool isUnique() const { return true; }
00055 
00056 private:
00057     explicit SimpleManager(int size) : _p() {
00058         if (size > 0) _p.reset(new U[size]);
00059     }
00060     boost::scoped_array<U> _p;
00061 };
00062 
00063 template <typename U>
00064 class ExternalManager : public Manager, private U {
00065 public:
00066     typedef U Owner;
00067 
00068     static Manager::Ptr make(Owner const & owner) {
00069         return Manager::Ptr(new ExternalManager(owner), false);
00070     }
00071 
00072     Owner const & getOwner() const { return *static_cast<Owner const *>(this); }
00073 
00074 private:
00075     explicit ExternalManager(Owner const & owner) : Owner(owner) {}
00076 };
